Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_00_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="cc10a181d2ce410584dd0558c850a22a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]There it is, new blood.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That is a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Lumiknoll[System:Color name="Default"].
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7b03b2c3d0404e25921a7646aaa6453e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]When dawn breaks,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it will release an
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]extract[System:Color name="Default"] I'll use to make that medicine.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7b03b2c3d0404e25921a7646aaa6453e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]But if the Lumiknoll is destroyed,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we won't
harvest any extract at all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7b03b2c3d0404e25921a7646aaa6453e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]All you need to do is [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]protect the Lumiknoll
until morning[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Simple,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Eheheh.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_02_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="555516ad9c1146bd834b643da40d66d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Well, well, now...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What's this?
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_03_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1df53c4295de442780e600deac9e6d8f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]These little guys weren't here before.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Let's observe them and see what they do.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_04_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="de9193d148cf48e8b857fc7283fe9776" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Talk"/]Look at that![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It propagated more.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Are
you thinking what I'm thinking, new blood?
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_05_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3e9512b38864476a8ead87340c78d3b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Yep,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] those little guys sure look like a new
variety of Pikmin to me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3e9512b38864476a8ead87340c78d3b0" Scale="1"/]They're kind of glowing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so "[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Glow Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"]"
seems like an appropriate name.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_06_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="46359dd88d774420948749ad22268b99" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they're rather fond of you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
new blood.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="46359dd88d774420948749ad22268b99" Scale="1"/]That's perfect![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You and these little guys
can protect the Lumiknoll together.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_07_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="499ef1b79972477e92a149b21861128c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That star-shaped fragment from earlier...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Let's call it a "[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow pellet[System:Color name="Default"]."[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="499ef1b79972477e92a149b21861128c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Try carrying those to the Lumiknoll to see
if we can propagate more Glow Pikmin.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="499ef1b79972477e92a149b21861128c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I leave it to you, then.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart2nd_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ec24aedce1c74ff69faae5348ecbe88c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so there's something else I've
figured out about the Glow Pikmin.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart2nd_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]As you can see, Glow Pikmin emit a very
powerful light.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/]You can use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_X_Button" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/] to gather your Glow
Pikmin until they meld together and
form one large glowing ball.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Release them all at once, and it creates
a luminous and literally stunning effect,
which I call a "[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Glowmob[System:Color name="Default"]"![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]One flash of that overpowering light, and
you will witness all kinds of creatures
cowering under its dazzling glow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart3rd_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="15cda8ec4572484f9cab37714c5c56c0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]Come in...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Can you hear me,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15cda8ec4572484f9cab37714c5c56c0" Scale="1"/]A while back,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I taught [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] a particular
skill used for operations that involve
protecting a client.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart3rd_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Select the Lumiknoll you want [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to
protect,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then give him the command.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]patrol near the Lumiknoll [System:Color name="Default"]and
bite any creatures that come close![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command" lipsync="0"/]During a night expedition,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if he gets
separated from your squad,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]he'll go
to that spot and patrol it for you[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/]Work with him to protect the Lumiknoll!
Night.Night_HowToDualPhotonHill_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9156698240224c93a5db1e2f6bbba815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]Heeey, new blood,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can you hear me?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9156698240224c93a5db1e2f6bbba815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]About tonight's location...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You should find
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]2 Lumiknolls[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9156698240224c93a5db1e2f6bbba815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]That's exciting, because if you protect
them until morning,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we can harvest [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]2
glow saps[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
Night.Night_HowToDualPhotonHill_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="155f57fa2c254fb5aa49a55af9f0485c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]My hypothesis is that the two Lumiknolls
are connected underground.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="155f57fa2c254fb5aa49a55af9f0485c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]What does that mean?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]if 1 breaks[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
neither will release glow sap.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="155f57fa2c254fb5aa49a55af9f0485c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There's only one of you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so this might be
a good time to take advantage of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s
protection skills.
Night.Night_HowToPhotonBall_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b422b1143d1a48cb8b7237380f1bc893" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]Remember the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Glow Seeds[System:Color name="Default"] you picked up
the other night?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I took the liberty of
putting them in your pack.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b422b1143d1a48cb8b7237380f1bc893" Scale="1"/]Let me show you how to use them.
Night.Night_HowToPhotonBall_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4382a27fb32f4722a78ed2fa9b71d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]First, select a Glow Seed from your pack.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4382a27fb32f4722a78ed2fa9b71d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]When you throw it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it will instantly [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]create
a Glow Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4382a27fb32f4722a78ed2fa9b71d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Of course, they'll only work at [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]night[System:Color name="Default"] or in
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]caves[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so don't forget that,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
Night.Night_AppearanceDodoro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4eaae3b4d6ae4fa49062eea758d0afee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]As creatures go,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's sure a strange
one,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] isn't it?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4eaae3b4d6ae4fa49062eea758d0afee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion/]Those eyes...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think it might be [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]coming
for the Lumiknoll[System:Color name="Default"]!
Night.Night_AppearanceDodoroCave_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="81fba741fa6942c69e3910f8a8ff8921" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Uh-oh...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've got a bad feeling about this.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81fba741fa6942c69e3910f8a8ff8921" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]We don't know what it's going to do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Be careful!
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e7026956b4024d7f8fceb959d681eabd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's about that time, new blood.
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6151d3c1253748999d8220f7c29fa2b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]See how the creatures become more
aggressive at night?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They're drawn
here by that irresistible glow.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6151d3c1253748999d8220f7c29fa2b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Watch out, now![etc:Wait frame="15"/] They'll [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]come for the
Lumiknoll[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so don't let them break it.
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e76ecce2e4b44f6b878b020475395f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Ah![etc:Wait frame="15"/] They're heading this way!
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_Pic01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7631a81b5d154c778f1cb360a1b35301" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]For now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]collect glow pellets[System:Color name="Default"] and
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]propagate more Glow Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"] to
build up your protective forces.
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_Pic02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3622317787ab47b494587f6a1c17d33d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]creatures will keep attacking [System:Color name="Default"]until
dawn,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so do your best to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]take them out[System:Color name="Default"].
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c997a77214384ed19fa50d67c14c6229" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]OK,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's up to you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Good luck!
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightBrokenWasurena:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e95582a93a74f2ab8c4e4737b85ab45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Aw scrubs![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The Lumiknoll's broken.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Not much we can do now.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightBrokenWasurena_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e7cbdf75b60b4734a9a071e8a1e7c7a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's a shame.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You'll get it right
next time, new blood.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUp:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b5280ef646274ba2bfd60cba2a847993" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Well done, new blood—you managed to
protect the Lumiknoll.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUp_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6e329c560fec4cdfb87306f0a53e0d66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thank goodness![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You protected it and held
yourself together, eheheh.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUp_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="da29510751d348b59370bcc92ededd58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Nicely done, new blood.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's take
the Glow Seeds back with us.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUpMax:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2f126c0410d84f0f89d36a4b8c67e21d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'm impressed you defeated all those
creatures![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I wasn't even sure you'd
survive the night.
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUpMax_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ac9585ba0cd24df9847ad6e3ab5523b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Fantastic![etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's not a single creature
left standing...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or skittering...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or hopping...
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUpMax_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a7f7394f491c45b9bffef0c3819ec595" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I wonder how many Glow Seeds we'll
get from this.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Eheheh.
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="718c5d7ad7a14596b0afaff16ce489c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Aha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Glow pellets can be carried here too![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="718c5d7ad7a14596b0afaff16ce489c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]From the looks of it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this could be a
juvenile form of a Lumiknoll.
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="90ae7f2d33144a5390b4e4e6dc21df3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]If that's the case,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then it's possible this
could be connected to the Lumiknoll
belowground.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="90ae7f2d33144a5390b4e4e6dc21df3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Maybe it could serve as an[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] interim drop
point when transporting glow pellets[System:Color name="Default"] from
far away.
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="aa562e01942b44d6a602f2ce90a6ab43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Additionally,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it seems like it could [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]act as
a decoy for the creatures [System:Color name="Default"]to help keep the
Lumiknoll safe.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aa562e01942b44d6a602f2ce90a6ab43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]It's small,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it shines quite brightly.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Why don't we call it a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Tricknoll[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f72562dabbf04dcaa5f77b40ca712ce1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Good thinking! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Try using it as a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]decoy [System:Color name="Default"]and
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]interim drop point[System:Color name="Default"].
Night.Night_InGame_FirstInvasionWasurenaNight:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9208efaae1084b00ad8fbeb50330ad47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Night_FirstInvasionWasurenaNight01"/]We've got a problem![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The Lumiknoll is
under attack![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9208efaae1084b00ad8fbeb50330ad47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly"/]If it takes too much damage,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we won't get
the medicinal ingredients we need from it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9208efaae1084b00ad8fbeb50330ad47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Night_FirstInvasionWasurenaNight02"/]Get rid of those creatures, new blood!
Night.Night_InGame_NightEndGetPhotonBall_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c62043e20c504953817384a97c133c6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Look![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The Glow Pikmin have come to
see you off.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c62043e20c504953817384a97c133c6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Do they want to follow you back to the
Rescue Command Post?
Night.Night_InGame_NightEndGetPhotonBall_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="48b8b8833b09483abf6ce981d7aa68f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]My, my,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what's this?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Glow Pikmin turn
into [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]seeds[System:Color name="Default"]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="48b8b8833b09483abf6ce981d7aa68f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I need to study this up close.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Please bring some back with you.
Night.Night_InGame_PhotonZenmetu_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0fa7eee8921d41e99750d5cd0ff76eea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Aw scrubs![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The Glow Pikmin can't help
if they all get wiped out.
Night.Night_InGame_PhotonZenmetu_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ce0e9a4d8fd04044b9c18b8979c4cf6c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what have we here?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] More Glow Pikmin?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ce0e9a4d8fd04044b9c18b8979c4cf6c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] keep an eye on them.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You don't want
them getting wiped out again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
Night.Night_InGame_GetPhotonFruit_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c2f30fcf59814d4f8c03781d0fb7e3d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] here it comes![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Pay attention,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
new blood!
Night.Night_InGame_GetPhotonFruit_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d796f605dee74e1fbd3c487379581961" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That is a condensed Lumiknoll extract.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's
very high in degradative enzymes.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d796f605dee74e1fbd3c487379581961" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I believe we should call it [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d796f605dee74e1fbd3c487379581961" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It's a critical ingredient for the leafling
cure.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Gather it with care, new blood!
Night.Night_InGame_GetPhotonFruit_99_00_00_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f97e9562752647b2be35e4fa11645ecd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/][Grammar:Cap/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You did it!
Night.Night_InGame_GetPhotonFruit_99_00_01_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8debe12b95524cd5a680efc968eb53d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You put in the effort out there, new blood.
Night.Night_InGame_GetPhotonFruit_99_00_02_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5e1ca74ba52e46478a607ff528eaea76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Amazing work tonight...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]as per usual!
Night.Night_InGame_GetPhotonFruit_99_01_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="58d8339fd8024dffa3b39f0f9ebcba34" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] look at the color on that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't
wait to make medicine with it.
Night.Night_InGame_GetPhotonFruit_99_01_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b4f03c4e1b6e45f192dbc75805f6503a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Alright then, new blood,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] go collect that
glow sap.
Night.Night_InGame_GetPhotonFruit_99_01_02_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="39f484a05dc94d9994a65c488ada888d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Now we can make the cure!
Night.Night_GetPhotonFruit_Dingo_First_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="153f0898b9a345de820fc8eec84b3899" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] good work protecting
the Lumiknoll.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="153f0898b9a345de820fc8eec84b3899" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Alright then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this is the moment![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Watch closely, now...
Night.Night_GetPhotonFruit_Dingo_First_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d947c226fdfe400bbc8837ab52c74797" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That is a condensed Lumiknoll extract.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's
very high in degradative enzymes.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d947c226fdfe400bbc8837ab52c74797" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I believe we should call it [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d947c226fdfe400bbc8837ab52c74797" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It's a key ingredient for the medicine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so
try not to drink it on the way back, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Night.Night_InGame_DingoBegin_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f07b79c728f94a3283207299c7eab80c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Hey, newbie,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the captain sent me here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Need me to jump in?
Night.Night_InGame_DingoBegin_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1ed00fd6d6cb42e0b5094d5db801bb72" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]What is it, rookie?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Need the help of
a real professional?
Night.Night_InGame_DingoBegin_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b16501c78e2f46acad9fee35114f03f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]OK, newbie,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll lend you a hand.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Because
the captain wants me to.[System:Color name="Default"]
Night.Night_InGame_DingoAfter_Retry_00_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c86de27212a04a8eb97c5a818178ac5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]You got some guts![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Go get 'em!
Night.Night_InGame_DingoAfter_Retry_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d16493b8f80d42ad864f6bd268996e2d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]OK, well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't get hurt![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]It'll mean more
work for me if you do.[System:Color name="Default"]
Night.Night_InGame_DingoAfter_Retry_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c4be6536cf7840349646a085365aff1b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Are you saying you can handle it on
your own?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]good.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's good.
Night.Night_InGame_DingoAfter_No_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a8f05607ff124e77aefa80c724efd516" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Whaaat?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] If you're gonna quit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] give me a
little warning first.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I was ready to show off
my stuff for the captain.[System:Color name="Default"]
Night.Night_InGame_DingoAfter_No_01_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0e19c663b1ab4043a82066102a7a4514" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Hmm![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Not gonna ask for my help,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?
Night.Night_InGame_DingoAfter_No_02_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="666c8ba5a027464b99ffc034b64f326d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Oh yeah?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] OK, later,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then.
Night.Night_InGame_DingoAfter_Yes_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c36ba7cd4d2d4388ab2907b8b363e9b8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Alright,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] leave it to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I hope the
captain's watching this.[System:Color name="Default"]
Night.Night_InGame_DingoAfter_Yes_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="02ec55ce5b4d4dc6bd072dd976bb98fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Don't get the wrong idea, rookie![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm only
doing this 'cause the captain asked me to!
Night.Night_InGame_DingoAfter_Yes_02_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fc74eda3f4bf40348f2bf9037ccd6bd5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]OK then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll clean this right up!
Night.Night_BlackBackTalk_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d25e7fc0b9654187bcb9498900e0ce32" Scale="1"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="BlackBackTalk_Ducking"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Gah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what IS this thing?!

Must be scared of me.
Night.Night_BlackBackTalk_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="134ea4fb026e44298e63481dc9067723" Scale="1"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="BlackBackTalk_Ducking"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]YEAHHH![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s ready for you!
Night.Night_BlackBackTalk_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7bd39bb1a9b340e9bde432d6ae567eeb" Scale="1"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="BlackBackTalk_Ducking"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Oh, blast it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I need more Bomb Rocks!
Night.Night_BlackBackTalk_02_02:

Night.Night_GetPhotonFruit_Dingo_01_01_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d4a543139d8a40e291102b975d476797" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Whew...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Protected it all the way!
